data.text: Rewinding to the day before――
data.processed: <story>Rewinding to the day before――

data.text:
Wait, what'd you just say...? 
――I don't have to make a choice? I can run on both?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Wait, what'd you just say...? 
<story>――I don't have to make a choice? I can run on both?

data.text:
Uhhh, just to be sure, you mean not just in the Junior class... 
But the Classic and Senior classes, too, right...?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Uhhh, just to be sure, you mean not just in the Junior class... 
<story>But the Classic and Senior classes, too, right...?

data.text: Th- Then, then, you really mean it's okay for me to run without worrying about the track? I've got the OK to run anywhere and everywhere?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Th- Then, then, you really mean it's okay for me to run without worrying about the track? I've got the OK to run anywhere and everywhere?

data.text: ――Noooo, nonono!! I'm telling you, there's just no way!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>――Noooo, nonono!! I'm telling you, there's just no way!!

data.text:
There's gonna be a Murder on the Digitan Express! I'll sink like 
the Titanic! If I let myself get pulled in both directions, I'll get 
torn clean in half! It'll be so over!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>There's gonna be a Murder on the Digitan Express! I'll sink like 
<story>the Titanic! If I let myself get pulled in both directions, I'll get 
<story>torn clean in half! It'll be so over!

data.text: Why tho!?
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Because you've put in the effort!
Because you've put in the effort!

data.processed: <story>Why tho!?

data.text: Put in the effort...?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Put in the effort...?

data.text: ――Ah.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>――Ah.

data.text: ...You're right. I did put in the effort. Day by day, giving love to my goddesses, worshipping them, building up my virtue――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: ...You're right. I did put in the effort. Day by day, giving love to my goddesses, worshipping them, building up my virtue――

data.text:
Are you perchance saying... That my efforts have borne their 
fruit?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Are you perchance saying... That my efforts have borne their 
<story>fruit?

data.text:
Have my virtuous deeds truly stacked up so high...? 
You think I'm finally at the level where I can stand proud as an 
Umamusume...?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Have my virtuous deeds truly stacked up so high...? 
<story>You think I'm finally at the level where I can stand proud as an 
<story>Umamusume...?

data.text:
You mean, the way I am now, I can run on any track...!? 
I'll never be able to match my faves, I know, but are you saying 
my willpower's just barely above the absolute minimum?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>You mean, the way I am now, I can run on any track...!? 
<story>I'll never be able to match my faves, I know, but are you saying 
<story>my willpower's just barely above the absolute minimum?

data.text:
The way she said it was a little weird, but I'm sure we wanted 
to say the same thing. Right, we both wanted to say――

choices.text: You should try and be an "all-rounder"!

data.processed:
<story>The way she said it was a little weird, but I'm sure we wanted 
<story>to say the same thing. Right, we both wanted to say――

data.text: AND IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII!!!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: AND IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII!!!!!

data.text:
Wew... But, yeah, you're right!! 
If you really think about it, I've put in tons of effort!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Wew... But, yeah, you're right!! 
<story>If you really think about it, I've put in tons of effort!

data.text: And, you know, "all-rounder"...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>And, you know, "all-rounder"...

data.text: Ahhh...! I just wuv the sound of that...! You mean, I can do anything, anything I want...!?
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: I'm just talking about racing, here!
I'm just talking about racing, here!

data.processed: Ahhh...! I just wuv the sound of that...! You mean, I can do anything, anything I want...!?

data.text: But of course! Trust me, I know the rules! Simp with your eyes, never ever with your hands! Slurp...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: But of course! Trust me, I know the rules! Simp with your eyes, never ever with your hands! Slurp...

data.text: Still... I can't believe my prayers really have been answered...! All the Garden of Eden's forbidden fruit are right before my very eyes...!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Still... I can't believe my prayers really have been answered...! All the Garden of Eden's forbidden fruit are right before my very eyes...!

data.text: ――Kuuuuuuuuuhhhhh!!!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: ――Kuuuuuuuuuhhhhh!!!!!

data.text: Right! I've steeled my will!! I, Digitan, will become an all-rounder! For the sake of witnessing ALL my faves with my own two eyes!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Right! I've steeled my will!! I, Digitan, will become an all-rounder! For the sake of witnessing ALL my faves with my own two eyes!

data.text:
And with that―― 
At long last, the Selection Race.
data.processed:
<story>And with that―― 
<story>At long last, the Selection Race.

data.text:
...Right. I'm going to be up soon. 
Here I go! I've got will strong enough to overcome samsara on 
the Sixfold Paths!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>...Right. I'm going to be up soon. 
<story>Here I go! I've got will strong enough to overcome samsara on 
<story>the Sixfold Paths!

data.text:
There's a rule saying you can't enter the Selection Race twice, 
but it only applies as far as "twice on the same type of track".
data.processed:
<story>There's a rule saying you can't enter the Selection Race twice, 
<story>but it only applies as far as "twice on the same type of track".

data.text: There isn't any rule against running a Selection Race for turf and dirt...Well, really it's more like there just wasn't any precedent for it. But if it's her―― No, because it's her...!
data.processed: There isn't any rule against running a Selection Race for turf and dirt...Well, really it's more like there just wasn't any precedent for it. But if it's her―― No, because it's her...!

data.text:
(...This is hallowed ground upon which many Umamusume-chans 
have run. I can't allow myself to taint it. No, instead――)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>(...This is hallowed ground upon which many Umamusume-chans 
<story>have run. I can't allow myself to taint it. No, instead――)

data.text:
(――I have to keep this hallowed ground all the more hallowed! 
I'll run with everything I've got!)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>(――I have to keep this hallowed ground all the more hallowed! 
<story>I'll run with everything I've got!)

data.text: All the racers are in the gates―― And the race is on!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed: <story>All the racers are in the gates―― And the race is on!

data.text:
(Umamusume-chans covered in dirt and their glistening sweat...!! 
Their strength―― their strength makes them so precious, so 
beautiful!!)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>(Umamusume-chans covered in dirt and their glistening sweat...!! 
<story>Their strength―― their strength makes them so precious, so 
<story>beautiful!!)

data.text:
Here comes Agnes Digital pushing to the front! 
What remarkable running on the last leg!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Here comes Agnes Digital pushing to the front! 
<story>What remarkable running on the last leg!

data.text:
(Umamusume-chans rushing across the turf, taking deep and 
heavy breaths...! Their elegance―― Their elegance makes them 
so precious, so charming...! In other words――)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>(Umamusume-chans rushing across the turf, taking deep and 
<story>heavy breaths...! Their elegance―― Their elegance makes them 
<story>so precious, so charming...! In other words――)

data.text: I LOVE THEM ALL, IN ALL THE WAYS THEY AAAAAARE!!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: I LOVE THEM ALL, IN ALL THE WAYS THEY AAAAAARE!!!!

data.text:
What's this!? Agnes Digital's showing unbelievable speed on 
turf, too!! Is such a thing even possible!?
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>What's this!? Agnes Digital's showing unbelievable speed on 
<story>turf, too!! Is such a thing even possible!?

data.text: What the...!? You mean... she doesn't pick her battlefield...!? She might have what it takes to be the strongest one day!!
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A
data.processed: What the...!? You mean... she doesn't pick her battlefield...!? She might have what it takes to be the strongest one day!!

data.text:
She ran even more wonderfully than I thought she would! 
I hurried down to congratulate her on a job well done.

choices.text: Good work! Nice running out there!
Good work! Nice running out there!

data.processed:
<story>She ran even more wonderfully than I thought she would! 
<story>I hurried down to congratulate her on a job well done.

data.text: Heheh, thank you very much...! And I'm super-duper thankful that I got to see my faves up close and personal!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Heheh, thank you very much...! And I'm super-duper thankful that I got to see my faves up close and personal!

data.text:
I owe it all to a you-know-who trainer with a whole bunch of 
virtue――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>I owe it all to a you-know-who trainer with a whole bunch of 
<story>virtue――

data.text:
You there! That was incredible. I can't believe you were so skilled 
on both turf and dirt...!
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>You there! That was incredible. I can't believe you were so skilled 
<story>on both turf and dirt...!

data.text: ――Hiwah!? Wh-Whaat!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>――Hiwah!? Wh-Whaat!?

data.text:
Please, won't you work with me? We'll start by building your 
skills with Junior class dirt races, then focus on turf――
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Please, won't you work with me? We'll start by building your 
<story>skills with Junior class dirt races, then focus on turf――

data.text: Eh, ah, sorry! But I have to say no...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Eh, ah, sorry! But I have to say no...

data.text:
I'm the type of girl who's all about diversity, you see! I can't just 
focus on one or the other, you see! I'm trying to be an 
all-rounder, you see! And――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>I'm the type of girl who's all about diversity, you see! I can't just 
<story>focus on one or the other, you see! I'm trying to be an 
<story>all-rounder, you see! And――

data.text:
The thing is... This trainer here's already agreed to train with 
little old Digitan!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>The thing is... This trainer here's already agreed to train with 
<story>little old Digitan!

data.text:
L-look, just play along...! 
All these people are getting me nervous!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>L-look, just play along...! 
<story>All these people are getting me nervous!

data.text:
Phew, I'm free... All eyes were on me for a bit there. Weird... 
Sorry for getting you caught up in that.
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Oh, right. About what you said back there.
choices.processed: <size=39>Oh, right. About what you said back there.</size>

data.processed:
<story>Phew, I'm free... All eyes were on me for a bit there. Weird... 
<story>Sorry for getting you caught up in that.

data.text:
Oh. Eheheh... It was just the first thing that came to mind. 
Sorry.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Oh. Eheheh... It was just the first thing that came to mind. 
<story>Sorry.

data.text:
But, uh, I really do want to work with you. 
See, most of the time when I'm with someone else, things tend to 
get real awkward――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>But, uh, I really do want to work with you. 
<story>See, most of the time when I'm with someone else, things tend to 
<story>get real awkward――

data.text:
You're an Umamusume-chan-fan too, so I'm really comfortable 
around you...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>You're an Umamusume-chan-fan too, so I'm really comfortable 
<story>around you...

data.text:
Plus, I don't think there's anyone else in the world who'd take my 
yapping as seriously as you. So...! Are you in?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Plus, I don't think there's anyone else in the world who'd take my 
<story>yapping as seriously as you. So...! Are you in?

data.text:
Oh, phew...! 
Alrighty then, I'm looking forward to working with you!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Oh, phew...! 
<story>Alrighty then, I'm looking forward to working with you!

data.text:
Umamusume run for all sorts of reasons. They chase their dreams 
in their own amazing ways. No matter what kind of dream it is. 
So I'll do my best to support her――
data.processed:
<story>Umamusume run for all sorts of reasons. They chase their dreams 
<story>in their own amazing ways. No matter what kind of dream it is. 
<story>So I'll do my best to support her――

data.text: ――Oh, almost forgot. Trainer-san.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>――Oh, almost forgot. Trainer-san.

data.text: What color glowstick do you want?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>What color glowstick do you want?

data.text: The Selection Races aren't done yet! We've got to get our virtuous deeds for the day, don't we!? ――Don't we!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: The Selection Races aren't done yet! We've got to get our virtuous deeds for the day, don't we!? ――Don't we!?
